entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
